wikitext.*:
'''Úrimë''' (''Urui'' in [[Sindarin]]) was the eighth month of the year in the [[King's Reckoning]] and the [[Stewards' Reckoning]] of [[Gondor]], following [[Cermië]], and preceding [[Yavannië]]. In the [[New Reckoning]] it was the fifth month of the year.

''Úrimë'' in the Kings' Reckoning (and for the most part in the Stewards' Reckoning) corresponded to [[Wedmath]] in the [[Shire Calendar]] (approximately modern [[24 July]] through [[22 August]]).<ref>{{App|Calendars}}</ref>

== Etymology ==
The first element of ''Urui'' is ''Ur-'', which is derived from Sindarin ''ûr'' "fire, heat".<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 396, entry UR-; {{S|Appendix}}, entry ''ur-''; {{PE|21}} p. 71.</ref> The second element ''-ui'' is a common adjectival ending,<ref>{{PE|17}}, p. 87.</ref> also present in other Sindarin names of the months.<ref>Cf. [[Nínui]], [[Nórui]], [[Hithui]].</ref>
